role.argrole: agent, entity making something be longer

(SBARQ (WHNP-1 (INTERROG_PRON أَيْه)) (S (ADJP-PRD (DET+NOUN المَطْلُوب)) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)))) (SQ (VP (IV1P+IV نِعْمِل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (WHNP-OBJ (INTERROG_ADV أِيْه)))) (SQ (SQ (VP (IV1P+IV نِقْتِل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:3MS ُه)))) (CONJ وَلّا) (SQ (VP (IV1P+IV نِمِدّ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:3MS ُه)) (PP (PREP عَلَى) (NP (NOUN رِجْلِي) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)))))) (PUNC ?)))
